alert.note: Alert for Central Willamette Valley; South Willamette Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Frost Advisory issued May 10 at 5:29PM PDT until May 11 at 8:00AM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 8 AM PDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Low temperatures ranging between 32-36F will result in frost formation. * WHERE...The Central Willamette Valley and South Willamette Valley, particularly along and west of Interstate 5. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 8 AM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Frost is much less likely to occur on the higher hills of the region and in the center of urban areas. The probabilities of near freezing temperatures occurring are only around 20-30% in Salem and Eugene proper, but considerably higher between Veneta to Corvallis to Dallas to McMinnville.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Central Willamette Valley; South Willamette Valley
